By Infernus on Wednesday, August 31, 2005 - 05:29 pm:

Only the people who read before they post. They're unlocking items, check the FAQ to see what monsters they unlock.

By Lightining on Thursday, December 1, 2005 - 07:53 am:

Hey I heard the Golden Peach is possible to get at the Torble University. Has that been tested for the American version of the game? If it is possible can someone give me some pointers. I have tried the spring every week and I never saw anything of the sort. Are there any conditions needing to be accomplished. I have finished the story line. I am able to raise monsters to about a 3200 composite without the use of it, but I just wanna know.

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, December 1, 2005 - 09:44 am:

There's no gold peach in this game, either version. It doesn't appear in any of the JP guidebooks to the game, even the one written by tecmo.

By Lightining on Thursday, December 1, 2005 - 11:38 am:

Ok so what significance is the document that has the Golden Peach myth written on it. Or are the documents just for fun?

By John Hawley on Thursday, December 1, 2005 - 02:35 pm:

Just to have a little fun for the most part. Generally they refer back to things and events in the previous games.
